channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Red C for The Sunday Business Post, 11–17 April 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Fine Gael (EPP): 30.1–35.9%
  • Fianna Fáil (ALDE): 20.4–25.6%
  • Sinn Féin (GUE/NGL): 12.0–16.3%
  • Labour Party (S&D): 3.8–6.5%
  • Solidarity–People Before Profit (GUE/NGL): 0.5–1.8%
  • Social Democrats (*): 1.3–3.1%
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 2.1–4.3%
  • Renua Ireland (*): 0.1–0.7%
  • Independent Alliance (*): 1.3–3.1%
  • Independents (*): 11.9–16.2%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Behaviour and Attitudes for The Sunday Times, 4–16 April 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:

  • Sinn Féin (GUE/NGL): 18.6–23.9%
  • Labour Party (S&D): 3.0–5.5%
  • Solidarity–People Before Profit (GUE/NGL): 0.5–1.8%
  • Social Democrats (*): 0.5–1.8%
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 0.5–1.8%
  • Renua Ireland (*): 0.1–0.8%
  • Independent Alliance (*): 3.0–5.5%
  • Independents (*): 6.6–10.2%

  • Independent Alliance (*): 2.1–4.3%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Ipsos MRBI for The Irish Times, 4–5 March 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Fine Gael (EPP): 27.5–32.7%
  • Fianna Fáil (ALDE): 21.7–26.5%
  • Sinn Féin (GUE/NGL): 18.8–23.4%
  • Labour Party (S&D): 4.8–7.5%
  • Solidarity–People Before Profit (GUE/NGL): 1.3–3.0%
  • Social Democrats (*): 0.6–1.8%
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 1.3–3.0%
  • Independent Alliance (*): 0.6–1.8%
  • Independents (*): 9.0–12.5%
